title: Air Magic
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Air Magic** skill determines how easily you can use spells involving air and electricity.

Air magic features many offensive [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") with unique targeting mechanics, such as [Shock](/Shock "Shock")'s ability to [doublezap](/Doublezap "Doublezap") or [Plasma Beam](/Plasma_Beam "Plasma Beam")'s auto-targeting. Many of its earlier spells can also be used to create [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud"). Most Air Magic can be resisted with [electricity resistance](/Electricity_resistance "Electricity resistance").

## Contents

- [1 Aptitudes](#Aptitudes)

- [2 Spells](#Spells)

  - [2.1 Level 1](#Level_1)
  - [2.2 Level 2](#Level_2)
  - [2.3 Level 3](#Level_3)
  - [2.4 Level 4](#Level_4)
  - [2.5 Level 5](#Level_5)
  - [2.6 Level 6](#Level_6)
  - [2.7 Level 7](#Level_7)
  - [2.8 Level 8](#Level_8)
  - [2.9 Level 9](#Level_9)

- [3 Sources](#Sources)

- [4 See also](#See_also)

- [5 History](#History)

- [Pale draconians](/Draconian#Pale "Draconian") get 1.
- [Grey draconians](/Draconian#Grey "Draconian") get -2.
- [Black draconians](/Draconian#Black "Draconian") get 2.

  - **[Book of Annihilations](/Book_of_Annihilations "Book of Annihilations")**: [Chain Lightning](/Chain_Lightning "Chain Lightning")
  - **[Book of Lightning](/Book_of_Lightning "Book of Lightning")**: [Vhi's Electric Charge](/Vhi%27s_Electric_Charge "Vhi's Electric Charge"), [Arcjolt](/Arcjolt "Arcjolt"), [Plasma Beam](/Plasma_Beam "Plasma Beam")
  - **[Book of Storms](/Book_of_Storms "Book of Storms")**: [Static Discharge](/Static_Discharge "Static Discharge"), [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike"), [Summon Lightning Spire](/Summon_Lightning_Spire "Summon Lightning Spire")
  - **[Book of Vapours](/Book_of_Vapours "Book of Vapours")**: [Mercury Vapours](/Mercury_Vapours "Mercury Vapours"), [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud"), [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud")
  - **[Maxwell's Memoranda](/Maxwell%27s_Memoranda "Maxwell's Memoranda")**: [Vhi's Electric Charge](/Vhi%27s_Electric_Charge "Vhi's Electric Charge"), [Arcjolt](/Arcjolt "Arcjolt"), [Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling](/Maxwell%27s_Capacitive_Coupling "Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling")

- Other Texts

  - **[Book of Decay](/Book_of_Decay "Book of Decay")**:
  - **[Book of Fire](/Book_of_Fire "Book of Fire")**: [Plasma Beam](/Plasma_Beam "Plasma Beam")
  - **[Book of Iron](/Book_of_Iron "Book of Iron")**: [Summon Lightning Spire](/Summon_Lightning_Spire "Summon Lightning Spire")
  - **[Book of the Moon](/Book_of_the_Moon "Book of the Moon")**: [Silence](/Silence "Silence")
  - **[Book of the Senses](/Book_of_the_Senses "Book of the Senses")**: [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud"), [Silence](/Silence "Silence")
  - **[Book of Spectacle](/Book_of_Spectacle "Book of Spectacle")**: [Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling](/Maxwell%27s_Capacitive_Coupling "Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling")
  - **[Book of the Spheres](/Book_of_the_Spheres "Book of the Spheres")**: [Conjure Ball Lightning](/Conjure_Ball_Lightning "Conjure Ball Lightning")
  - **[Trismegistus Codex](/Trismegistus_Codex "Trismegistus Codex")**: [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud")
  - **[Young Poisoner's Handbook](/Young_Poisoner%27s_Handbook "Young Poisoner's Handbook")**: [Mercury Vapours](/Mercury_Vapours "Mercury Vapours")

## See also

- [Air Elementalist](/Air_Elementalist "Air Elementalist")

## History

- [0.30](/0.30 "0.30") Added [Arcjolt](/Arcjolt "Arcjolt") and [Plasma Beam](/Plasma_Beam "Plasma Beam"), removed [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt")
- [0.27](/0.27 "0.27") [Tornado](/Tornado "Tornado") changed to ice-themed [Polar Vortex](/Polar_Vortex "Polar Vortex"), and [Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling](/Maxwell%27s_Capacitive_Coupling "Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling") added instead of [Absolute Zero](/Absolute_Zero "Absolute Zero"). [Chain Lightning](/Chain_Lightning "Chain Lightning") moved to level 9. [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form") added.
- [0.25](/0.25 "0.25") Removed [Deflect Missiles](/Deflect_Missiles "Deflect Missiles").
- [0.22](/0.22 "0.22") Prior to this version, some enemies could resist wind damage. This was changed to resist the [Tornado](/Tornado "Tornado") spell only.

html:
Air Magic

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

Air Magic skill determines how easily you can use spells involving air and electricity.

Air magic features many offensive Conjurations with unique targeting mechanics, such as Shock's ability to doublezap or Plasma Beam's auto-targeting. Many of its earlier spells can also be used to create clouds. Most Air Magic can be resisted with electricity resistance.

Contents

  • 1 Aptitudes
  • 2 Spells
    • 2.1 Level 1

    • 2.3 Level 3
    • 2.4 Level 4
    • 2.5 Level 5
    • 2.6 Level 6
    • 2.7 Level 7
    • 2.8 Level 8
    • 2.9 Level 9
  • 3 Sources
  • 4 See also
  • 5 History

  • Grey draconians get -2.
  • Black draconians get 2.

History

  • 0.27 Tornado changed to ice-themed Polar Vortex, and Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling added instead of Absolute Zero. Chain Lightning moved to level 9. Storm Form added.
  • 0.25 Removed Deflect Missiles.
  • 0.22 Prior to this version, some enemies could resist wind damage. This was changed to resist the Tornado spell only.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
'''Air Magic''' skill determines how easily you can use spells involving air and electricity. 

Air magic features many offensive [[Conjurations]] with unique targeting mechanics, such as [[Shock]]'s ability to [[doublezap]] or [[Plasma Beam]]'s auto-targeting. Many of its earlier spells can also be used to create [[cloud]]s. Most Air Magic can be resisted with [[electricity resistance]].

{{skill aptitudes}}

{{spell table by level|Air}}

==Sources==

{{spell sources|Air|Book of Air,Book of Annihilations,Book of Lightning,Book of Storms,Book of Vapours,Maxwell's Memoranda}}

==See also==
*[[Air Elementalist]]

==History==
*[[0.30]] Added [[Arcjolt]] and [[Plasma Beam]], removed [[Lightning Bolt]]
*[[0.27]] [[Tornado]] changed to ice-themed [[Polar Vortex]], and [[Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling]] added instead of [[Absolute Zero]]. [[Chain Lightning]] moved to level 9. [[Storm Form]] added.
*[[0.25]] Removed [[Deflect Missiles]].
*[[0.22]] Prior to this version, some enemies could resist wind damage. This was changed to resist the [[Tornado]] spell only.

{{Skills}}
[[Category:Air Magic|*]]
[[Category:Magic skills]]
